attributes.action: Review UK policy on alleged global warming proved false 16 years of no change and flawed computer models.
attributes.additional_details: Global temperature has not significantly increased over the last 16 years. Computer models which are the foundation of the climate change argument do not mirror actual observations. Increased Co2 in the atmosphere have not resulted in a corresponding increase in temperature. The UK should reassess its position on global warming and withdraw its support for UN agenda 21 .
